Step.name: If
Step.Calculation: LeftWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Side Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 1 ) = "Website"

Step.name: Else If
Step.Calculation: LeftWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Side Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 1 ) = "Office" or LeftWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Side Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 1 ) = "Personal"

To.Calculation: Contacts::Name for Labels & " <" & MiddleWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Side Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 2 ; 999 ) & ">"

Message.Calculation: "Dear " & Contacts::Name for Labels & ",¶¶¶¶" & "Best Regards¶¶" & Get ( UserName )

Step.name: Else If
Step.Calculation: LeftWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Side Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 1 ) = Contacts::Video App

Step.name: Open URL
Step.Calculation: Case ( LeftWords ( GetRepetition ( Contacts::Side Placeholder ; Get ( ScriptParameter ) ) ; 1 ) = "Work" ; MapAddressWeb ( Contacts::Work Address 1 ; Contacts::Work Address 2 ; Contacts::Work City ; Contacts::Work State ; …
